group_1.textRight: I’m home, Asunaro City!@It’s been a month~.

group_1.textLeft: It was a month away from Japan for me…
The humidity really makes me feel like@I’m back home.

group_1.textRight: Was the Novel Convention in France exciting?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I really felt how ardent their passion was@for the Japanese material.
And you, Kaoru?@Was the training camp good?

group_1.textRight: Yep, I think I really caught the higher-ups’@attention.
Looks like the two of us had a really good time.

group_1.textLeft: Though Kazumi had to be alone for all this@time…

group_1.textRight: We gotta get home and meet her quickly!

group_1.narration: “We’re back, Kazumi!@Heeey, we brought gifts for yoouu!”
“You did great, watching the house all this time.”

group_1.textRight: Huh? Is she not home?
Maybe she went grocery shopping for dinner…

group_1.textLeft: …No.
The living room and the kitchen don’t look@like they’ve been used…
There’s also dust accumulating.
…Which means Kazumi must’ve been gone@for several days now.

group_1.textRight: Maybe she got lonely and went to stay at@Mr. Tachibana’s?

group_1.textLeft: Tachibana from “Lepa Mačka,” is it?@Let’s give him a call.

group_1.textRight: …Kazumi?@No, she hasn’t been here…

group_1.textLeft: Is that so…

group_1.textRight: By the way, I haven’t seen her lately.@Did something happen?

group_1.textLeft: No, we had left the house for a while, and@she wasn’t there when we came back…
We’ll ask other places.

group_1.textRight: When she comes back, tell her I got some@new sweets I want her to taste-test.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, I’ll make sure to tell her.

group_1.textRight: Where did that girl go off to…@Don’t tell me…she ran away?

group_1.textLeft: I can’t imagine any reason for her to do that.

group_1.textRight: That is true… @Has she been going to school…?

group_1.textLeft: I’ll ask our classmates.

group_1.textRight: …What’s wrong, Umika?

group_1.textLeft: I apologize for calling this late.
So, this is about Kazumi…

group_1.textRight: Oh, Kazumi!@Is she alright, by the way?

group_1.textLeft: What?@Do you know something?!

group_1.textRight: No, not really…@But she was sick, wasn’t she?

group_1.textLeft: Sick?!
W-what was she sick with?

group_1.textRight: Eh, don’t you know that?
She got admitted into a hospital in some@city far away.
But we heard it was just an exam@and that weshouldn’t worry.
And that was you two who told us in the@group chat, no?

group_1.textLeft: …We did?
Someone had contacted the school in our stead?

group_1.textRight: So there’s someone impersonating us two,@is what you’re saying.

group_1.textLeft: This is definitely much more than her just@running away.

group_1.textRight: A kidnapping…?
